app.title: PANDOM - Stack boilerplate
app.description: A modern full-stack application with authentication, dashboard, and PWA capabilities
app.enable-javascript: Please enable JavaScript to continue using this application.

login.password-recovery-sent: If the email is registered, you will receive a link to reset your password.
login.fill-required-fields: Please fill in all required fields correctly
login.google-login-coming-soon: Google login will be available soon!
login.apple-login-coming-soon: Apple login will be available soon!

register.fill-required-fields: Please fill in all required fields correctly
register.registration-success: Registration successful! Please check your email to verify your account.
register.google-register-coming-soon: Google registration will be available soon!
register.apple-register-coming-soon: Apple registration will be available soon!

recover.title: Forgot password
recover.recovery-message: If registered, you will receive a mail to reset your password.
recover.recovery-sent: Password recovery mail has been sent successfully!
recover.recovery-error: An error occurred while sending recovery mail
recover.fill-required-fields: Please fill in all required fields correctly

reset.title: Reset Password
reset.subtitle: Enter your new password below
reset.password-pattern: Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number and special character
reset.success: Password reset successfully! Redirecting to login...
reset.reset-error: An error occurred during password reset
reset.fill-required-fields: Please fill in all required fields correctly

verify.title: Verify your account with the code sent to your email
verify.wrong-otp: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
verify.resend-code-sent: Verification code has been resent to your email
verify.resend-code-error: An error occurred while resending the verification code
verify.fill-required-fields: Please fill in all required fields correctly

security-logs.description: View your recent security activities and access logs.
security-logs.error: Failed to load security logs. Please try again later.

download.description: Download a copy of all your personal data stored in our system. This includes your profile information, account details, and activity logs.
download.info: Your data will be exported in a secure format and includes all information we have about your account.
download.expires: The download link will expire after 24 hours for security reasons.
download.success: Your personal data download has started successfully!
download.error: Failed to download your personal data. Please try again later.

change-password.description: To change your password, we will send a verification code to your email address. You will then be redirected to the password reset page where you can set your new password.
change-password.info: A verification code will be sent to your registered email address.
change-password.warning: You will be logged out after the verification code is sent and redirected to the password reset page.
change-password.email-sent: Verification code sent successfully! You will be redirected to the password reset page.
change-password.email-failed: Failed to send verification code. Please try again later.
change-password.no-email: No email address found for your account.

delete-account.description: This action will permanently delete your account and all associated data. This process cannot be undone.
delete-account.info: All your personal data, settings, and account information will be permanently removed.
delete-account.irreversible: This action is irreversible and cannot be undone.
delete-account.data-retention: Some data may be retained for legal or regulatory purposes as required by law.
delete-account.success: Your account has been successfully deleted. You will be redirected to the login page.
delete-account.failed: Failed to delete your account. Please try again later.

create.message: Are you sure you want to create this user?

delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

errors.fill-required-fields: Please fill in all required fields correctly
errors.user-creation-error: An error occurred during user creation
errors.user-deletion-error: An error occurred during user deletion

pwa.offline-mode: You are currently offline. Some features may be limited.

install.title: Install PANDOM
install.description: Install this app on your device for quick and easy access when you're on the go.
